extendedInfo.description: This is the BEST Spades game available on Android phones. With rich graphics and smooth animations, this game is the premier Spades game in Android Market and it's totally FREE.Game Features:- Play solo or with a partner(AI) against multiple AI difficulties: Easy, Medium, and Hard- Support for Blind Nil bids- Customize the look and feel of the avatars- Great graphics and awesome sound effects- Outstanding card animations Now place your bids and work with your partner to outfox your opponent!

reviews.comment: Cheats...played an ace & a lower card of the same suit takes it. When u bid a nil the game plays out of ur hand purposely plays lower cards to set u.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible AI
reviews.comment: Computer partner constantly over trumping you. Makes terrible decisions. Not worth a download if your actually any good at real spades.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Team mate is mentally challenged, y would they play a joker when u have the other down already??? Uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Whoever gives this game 5 stars doesn\'t know how to play spades. The AI is horrible, breaks your nil when they can avoid it, but will take 4 bags when you aren\'t going nil. doesn\'t always gives nil points. Scoring is completely wrong half the time giving you -160 points for 10 bags but you made all your books. Avoid this app real players.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would be zero stars if possible
reviews.comment: Ai teammate underbids and cuts constantly scoring is wrong the only time I get a lot if high cards is if I go blind nil could go on forever horrible don\'t download!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is a joke right
reviews.comment: Why cant this program  handle basic spade moves. Like knowing when to cut or not to cut a book. Like bidding accordingly. Like covering ur partner in a nil bidding. Its set for team mode playing but it feels like i am playing 3 on 1 spades. I guess you get what u pay for with this game.
reviews.author: Joseph Miller

reviews.title: Scoring issue
reviews.comment: Game does not show scoring breakdown.  Each spades game seems to calculate scores differently.  Losing 170 points for having too many bags seems extreme.  Everyone grossly under bids.  It\'s annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Extremely frustrating!
reviews.comment: There is no use in downloading this game!  Your partner does not play cards that are beneficial towards winning the game. There is absolutely no teamwork from your partner. Do not waste your time. Partner throws highest spade when trumping in and doesn\'t  play highest card to cover when going nil. As well as a billion other mistakes. Zero stars!!!
reviews.author: Desirea Ouellette

reviews.comment: Cards are too small & irritating to select. Also, played the Ace of Spades in a trick & LOST the trick? How is that possible?! Whatever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worse spades app ever!
reviews.comment: The AI cheats & makes worse plays. Plays high card when can take win with lower card; knows what u & ur AI partner has so plays accordingly; underbids, etc. I cannot adapt to the nonsense! Should\'ve listened to prior reviews..uninstalling!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Decent game. Cards easy 2 pick. Cant save settings. Not good when a good hand is dealt. Have to quit the game just to fix. Need better pics. Backflip
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The computer control Wat I can play, it NEVER let  me play spades until last. My partner cuts me out. I think this is HORRIBLY as a DIE HARD SPADE PLA
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nicely done game.
reviews.comment: Default players play rather well, fun, nice pace, good casual game. I had to shut off sounds (what\'s with the scream?). Opening selection boxes cover my cards (the nil & bid boxes), when I\'m supposed to decide how many tricks I can take. Final score box numbers are far too tiny (same as some games). Other players always have seven cards in their hand, even at the end of a round (seems strange at first). Acer Iconia TAB A500.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is alright...but
reviews.comment: Loved it at first, then once I started winning, the cpu players all of a sudden have 8-10 books every hand. Then when you set them, they flat out cheat. Also wish you could change partners because mine played terribly. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best spades game on here so far. Look forward to upgrades. Maybe able to make profiles & play people even through fb. Like zynga poker or mytopia.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spades free
reviews.comment: This app is horrible, the uppposing team knows what I am holding in my hand. I could handle ALL the other issues, but I can\'t hang if every1 knows what I am holding.
reviews.author: Sandra Gasman

reviews.title: Spades
reviews.comment: This game is so addictive! I feel if though I\'m actually playing with real people.
reviews.author: Juana Torres

reviews.title: Nice game!
reviews.comment: Looks good on my 4.5\" screen. Get a phone with a bigger screen if ya cards too small. Better than paid apps!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Retarded partner
reviews.comment: Part is a complete idiot. Intentionally throwing tricks and getting set one hand.  Then underbidding and sandbagging the next.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UGH
reviews.comment: And along with the rest of the HORRIBLE reviews, why is there a save option if when you come back, the game isn\'t saved???
reviews.author: A Google User
